column2: Naval and fishing communities are advised not to venture into the sea areas  off the

coast  extending 
from  Mannar 
to  Pottuvil  via  Kankasanthurai,  Trincomalee  and
Batticaloa and in to the marked areas for the next 48 hour.
Those who are out at aforementioned sea regions are advised to return to coasts or
Fishing and naval community are requested to be attentive to future forecasts issued
by the Department of Meteorology in this regard.
